context_bundle.summary: AI agent for test generation and analysis
context_bundle.content:
Testing agent capabilities.

Test Generation:
- Unit tests from function signatures
- Integration tests from API specs
- E2E tests from user stories
- Property-based tests

Coverage Analysis:
- Line/branch coverage reporting
- Uncovered path identification
- Test quality assessment
- Flaky test detection

Strategies:
- Happy path first
- Edge cases second
- Error conditions third
- Performance scenarios last
